text: The 2017 British Superbike Championship season was the 30th British Superbike Championship season. It began at Donington on 31 March and ended at the Brands Hatch GP circuit on 15 October. Shane Byrne started the season as the defending Champion, having secured his fifth overall title in the British Superbike Championship ==Teams and riders== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size: 85%;" |- !Team !Constructor ! !Rider !Rounds |- |rowspan=2| Be Wiser Ducati Racing Team !rowspan=2| Ducati |align=center| 2 | Glenn Irwin |1–4, 6–12 |- |align=center| 67 | Shane Byrne |All |- |rowspan=4| Quattro Plant FS-3 Racing Kawasaki !rowspan=4| Kawasaki |align=center| 3 | Billy McConnell |1–7 |- |style="background:#ffcccc;" align=center| 81 |style="background:#ffcccc;"| Luke Stapleford |9 |- |style="background:#ffcccc;" align=center| 83 |style="background:#ffcccc;"| Danny Buchan |11 |- |style="background:#ffcccc;" align=center| 97 |style="background:#ffcccc;"| Kyle Ryde |12 |- |rowspan=2| Honda Racing !rowspan=2| Honda |align=center| 4 | Dan Linfoot |All |- |align=center| 22 | Jason O'Halloran |All |- | Gearlink Kawasaki !
